segments.text: Glancing at this scene, the kitchen feels warm with daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a peaceful garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the faucet runs unchecked, overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That constant stream of water is just wasteful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It splashes onto the floor, creating a slippery hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, foot in the wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware of the growing problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy climbs the stool to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs splay out, unstable as can be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, which makes it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, palm open for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like thatâ€”kids will be kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the mess from the water turns my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
